AT.name: Advance Wars™
AT.description: Das bedeutet Krieg! Gegnerische Truppen sammeln sich an der Grenze! Übernimm den Befehl über Boden-, Luft- und Seestreitkräfte und wehre die feindlichen Angriffe auf mehr als 100 Schlachtfeldern ab. Advance Wars ist eine hochgelobte Kampfsimulation, die auf dem Game Boy™ Advance ein großer Erfolg war, und verbindet rundenbasierte Strategie mit überzeugendem, zugänglichen Gameplay.

AU.name: Advance Wars™
AU.description: This means war! Enemy troops are amassing at your borders, so take command of ground, air and naval forces and repel the enemies’ attacks across more than 100 battlefields. Advance Wars is the critically acclaimed combat simulation that made a big impact on Game Boy™ Advance; blending tactical turn-based strategy with satisfying, accessible gameplay.

BG.name: Advance Wars™
BG.description: This means war! Enemy troops are amassing at your borders, so take command of ground, air and naval forces and repel the enemies’ attacks across more than 100 battlefields. Advance Wars is the critically acclaimed combat simulation that made a big impact on Game Boy™ Advance; blending tactical turn-based strategy with satisfying, accessible gameplay.

BE.name: Advance Wars™
BE.description: La guerre est déclarée ! Les forces ennemies se sont massées à vos frontières, et vous allez devoir commander vos troupes sur terre, en mer et dans les airs pour repousser les envahisseurs sur plus de 100 champs de bataille ! À sa sortie sur Game Boy™ Advance, ce titre a été encensé par la critique. En effet, il présente la complexité d'un jeu de stratégie au tour par tour tout en offrant un gameplay accessible à tous.

ES.name: Advance Wars™
ES.description: ¡Esto es la guerra! Las tropas enemigas se están agrupando en las fronteras de tu territorio, así que tendrás que tomar el mando de tus unidades de tierra, mar y aire para hacerles frente en más de cien campos de batalla. Advance Wars, un juego de simulación de combate aclamado por la crítica que cosechó gran éxito en Game Boy™ Advance, mezcla la estrategia táctica por turnos con una mecánica de juego accesible y amena.

IT.name: Advance Wars™
IT.description: Questa sì che è guerra! Le truppe nemiche si stanno radunando ai tuoi confini. Prendi il comando delle forze di terra, aeree e navali e respingi gli attacchi nemici su più di 100 campi di battaglia. Advance Wars è il gioco di simulazione di combattimento che ha lasciato il segno sul Game Boy™ Advance; combinando la profondità di un gioco strategico a turni con un gameplay semplice e avvincente.

NL.name: Advance Wars™
NL.description: Dit betekent oorlog! Vijandelijke troepen stellen zich op bij je grenzen. Voer het bevel over grondtroepen, lucht- en zeemacht en sla de aanvallen van je vijand af op meer dan 100 slagvelden Advance Wars is het gelauwerde gevechtssimulatiespel dat hoge ogen gooide op de Game Boy™ Advance. Het combineert tactische turn-based oorlogvoering met toegankelijke gameplay.

NZ.name: Advance Wars™
NZ.description: This means war! Enemy troops are amassing at your borders, so take command of ground, air and naval forces and repel the enemies’ attacks across more than 100 battlefields. Advance Wars is the critically acclaimed combat simulation that made a big impact on Game Boy™ Advance; blending tactical turn-based strategy with satisfying, accessible gameplay.

PL.name: Advance Wars™
PL.description: This means war! Enemy troops are amassing at your borders, so take command of ground, air and naval forces and repel the enemies’ attacks across more than 100 battlefields. Advance Wars is the critically acclaimed combat simulation that made a big impact on Game Boy™ Advance; blending tactical turn-based strategy with satisfying, accessible gameplay.

PT.name: Advance Wars™
PT.description: Isto significa guerra! As tropas inimigas estão a amontoar-se nas tuas fronteiras, por isso tens que assumir o comando das tuas forças terrestres, aéreas e navais e combater os ataques dos inimigos em mais de 100 campos de batalha. Advance Wars é um jogo de simulação de combate bastante aclamado pela crítica, que teve um grande impacto no Game Boy™ Advance e que combina estratégia tática por turnos com uma jogabilidade acessível e agradável.

RU.name: Advance Wars™
RU.description: Хочешь мира — готовься к войне! Вражеские войска стекаются к вашим границам, пора взять на себя командование пехотой, военно-воздушными силами и морским флотом, чтобы отразить атаки противника на ста с лишним полях боя. Игра Advance Wars — это боевой симулятор, заслуживший положительную оценку критиков и ставший хитом на Game Boy™ Advance благодаря сочетанию пошаговой стратегии с увлекательным и несложным игровым процессом.
